snippet: Mr. Boswell, a former Twins pitcher, won 20 games in 1969 but his accomplishment was overshadowed by an off-the-field brawl with his manager.
abstract: Dave Boswell, a former Minnesota Twins pitcher who won 20 games in 1969 but is most remember for an off-the-field brawl with his manager Billy Martin, dies at age 67.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Boswell, a former Twins pitcher, won 20 games in 1969 but his accomplishment was overshadowed by an off-the-field brawl with his manager.

headline.seo: Dave Boswell, Pitcher Who Tussled With Billy Martin, Is Dead at 67
headline.main: Dave Boswell, Pitcher Who Fought Billy Martin, Dies at 67
headline.print_headline: Dave Boswell, 67, Pitcher Who Fought Billy Martin
